text: Hi everyone, can Non-HubSpot forms accept and pass through all 5 UTMs? (content, term, campaign, source, medium)?
Hi, is someone could tell me if it's possible to force some css in CRM Custom Cards with React (Bêta), by example to set a max width of a flex element and put scroll-y on it ?

Hi , all
I want to inform you that we are facing this issue , in creating the unique object property in contact .

Unique properties creation working from UI of HubSpot , not working the same by api call , that we made from node.js api client or HubSpot developer api .

This below references says that we can create , unique object property inside contact column
Reference link
1.change log:-  Unique Properties support for newly created Contact properties (<http://HubSpot.com|HubSpot.com>)
2.HubSpot doc:- <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/properties#create-unique-identifier-properties>

Other developer also facing the same issue , see the below link:-
3.Other developer community tickets :- <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Create-unique-identifier-for-Contact/m-p/896782#M69890>

If anyone can help us  in this problem it will be great help specially from <@U01QVR44MEY> <@U05H3C4GDMX>, although it feels like its an issue from HubSpot API Developer side .

See the images attached to know what response getting when trying to create unique property , even on passing hasUniqueValue:true explicitly , its retunning the false .<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/docs/T22MX8Z8B/F06BUF4S9SL> (edited)

Hello, I have a question about the Email. In a email there is a Social module.

This contains the old twitter logo. Is it possible to edit this module and replace the twitter icon with the new X (twitter) icon?

I am not able to find this module.
<@U01GW2U4WMA> This is sadly not the same module.

Hi everyone, My company uses HubSpot in a B2C way, and we are currently having trouble with revenue attrubution for email. It seems depending on how much you click around the site before you purchase affects what percentage of revenue gets attributed to an email. Basically all we want to do is have a way to see how many people clicked through through an email and what deals can be attributed to it.
 I dont think we are the only company that is B2C that uses HubSpot and would like to know how much revenue is being created by an email / email campaign
For now I amde a new custom module to handle this. If someone still is able to find this specific module or help me out here let me know.
